input.activity_signal: Web search results show recent competitive analysis articles from 2025 discussing "Twilio Competitors And Alternatives" and ongoing market positioning, indicating active business operations. Company appears in local calling guide database as active telecom provider. However, FCC filing is from 2019 with no recent activity.
input.product_summary: Twilio provides communication APIs and platform services, enabling developers to integrate voice, VoIP, and SMS capabilities into applications through simple code interfaces.
